name: Podcast Editing
description: Full cleanup, EQ, compression, de-noising, and loudness matching for spoken-word episodes.

name: Mixing
description: Professional multi-track balancing with depth, clarity, and competitive sonic polish.

name: Mastering
description: Final loudness optimization, tonal balancing, and platform-ready export prep.

name: Vocal Tuning
description: Natural-sounding pitch and timing correction for lead and background vocals.

name: Dialogue Cleanup
description: Removes clicks, hum, room noise, and harshness from interviews and voiceover.

name: Beat Production
description: Custom instrumental production tailored to your references and vocal style.

name: Audiobook Post-Production
description: Chapter-level editing, pacing refinement, and ACX-compliant mastering.

name: Stem Mastering
description: Enhanced control mastering from grouped stems for improved dynamics and translation.

name: Live Session Editing
description: Comping and tightening for live band recordings while preserving performance energy.

name: Sound Design
description: Original effects, transitions, and sonic branding elements for media projects.
